method.name: Date
method.shortdesc: Returns a new Date object holding the current date and time.
method.description: If parameters are supplied, returns a new Date object holding the supplied date and time.

parameters.name: year
parameters.shortdesc: The year expressed in four digits.

parameters.name: month
parameters.shortdesc: An integer value from 0 (Jan) to 11 (Dec).

parameters.name: day
parameters.shortdesc: An integer value from 1 to 31, If this argument is not supplied, its value is set to 0.

parameters.name: hours
parameters.shortdesc: An integer value from 0 (midnight) to 23 (11 PM). If this argument is not supplied, its value is set to 0.

parameters.name: min
parameters.shortdesc: An integer value from 0 to 59. If this argument is not supplied, its value is set to 0.

parameters.name: sec
parameters.shortdesc: An Integer value from 0 to 59. If this argument is not supplied, its value is set to 0.

parameters.name: ms
parameters.shortdesc: An integer value from 0 to 999. If this argument is not supplied, its value is set to 0.

method.name: parse
method.shortdesc: Parses a string, returning a new Date object. The string should be similar to the string returned bt toString().

parameters.name: text
parameters.shortdesc: The string to parse.

method.name: UTC
method.shortdesc: Returns the number of milliseconds between midnight January 1, 1970, UTC, and the specified time.

parameters.name: year
parameters.shortdesc: The year expressed in four digits, for example, 2001.
parameters.description: To indicate for a year from 1900 to 1999, you can specify a value from 0 to 99.

parameters.name: month
parameters.shortdesc: An integer value from 0 (Jan) to 11 (Dec).

parameters.name: day
parameters.shortdesc: An integer value from 1 to 31, If this argument is not supplied, its value is set to 0.

parameters.name: hours
parameters.shortdesc: An integer value from 0 (midnight) to 23 (11 PM). If this argument is not supplied, its value is set to 0.

parameters.name: min
parameters.shortdesc: An integer value from 0 to 59. If this argument is not supplied, its value is set to 0.

parameters.name: sec
parameters.shortdesc: An Integer value from 0 to 59. If this argument is not supplied, its value is set to 0.

parameters.name: ms
parameters.shortdesc: An integer value from 0 to 999. If this argument is not supplied, its value is set to 0.

method.example: Date.UTC&#40;year , month, date, hour, min, sec, ms)

method.name: getDate
method.shortdesc: Returns the day of the month of the specified Date object in local time.

method.name: getDay
method.shortdesc: Returns the day of the week for the specified Date object in local time.
method.description: This is an integer from 0 (Sunday) to 6 (Saturday).  Returns the day of the week for date.

method.name: getYear
method.shortdesc: Returns the year of the specified Date object, as a difference from 1900, in local time.

method.name: getFullYear
method.shortdesc: Returns the four digit year of the specified Date object in local time.

method.name: getHours
method.shortdesc: Returns the hour of the specified Date object in local time.

method.name: getMilliseconds
method.shortdesc: Returns the milliseconds of the specified Date object in local time.

method.name: getMinutes
method.shortdesc: Returns the minutes of the specified Date object in local time.

method.name: getMonth
method.shortdesc: Returns the month of the specified Date object in local time.

method.name: getSeconds
method.shortdesc: Returns the seconds of the specified Date object in local time.

method.name: getTime
method.shortdesc: Returns the number of milliseconds since midnight January 1,1970 UTC for the specified Date object.

method.name: getTimezoneOffset
method.shortdesc: Returns the difference in minutes between the computer's local time and UTC.

method.name: getUTCDate
method.shortdesc: Returns the day of the month of the specified Date object according to UTC.

method.name: getUTCDay
method.shortdesc: Returns the day of the week for the specified Date object according to UTC.

method.name: getUTCFullYear
method.shortdesc: Returns the four digit year of the specified Date object according to UTC.

method.name: getUTCHours
method.shortdesc: Returns the hour of the specified Date object according to UTC.

method.name: getUTCMilliseconds
method.shortdesc: Returns the milliseconds of the specified Date object according to UTC.

method.name: getUTCMinutes
method.shortdesc: Returns the minutes of the specified Date object according to UTC.

method.name: getUTCMonth
method.shortdesc: Returns the month of the specified Date object according to UTC.

method.name: getUTCSeconds
method.shortdesc: Returns the seconds of the specified Date object according to UTC.

method.name: setDate
method.shortdesc: Sets the day of the month of a specified Date object according to local time.
method.description: Returns the number of milliseconds between the new date and midnight, January 1, 1970.

parameters.name: date
parameters.shortdesc: An integer from 1 to 31 indicating the day of the month.

method.name: setFullYear
method.shortdesc: Sets the year of a specified Date object according to local time.
method.description: This method can also set month and date if those arguments are specified. Returns the number of milliseconds between the new date and midnight, January 1, 1970.

parameters.name: year
parameters.shortdesc: A four-digit integer value indicating the year to set.

method.name: setHours
method.shortdesc: Sets the hours of a specified Date object according to local time.
method.description: Returns the number of milliseconds between the new date and midnight, January 1, 1970.

parameters.name: hour
parameters.shortdesc: An integer value from 0 (midnight) to 23 (11 PM).

method.name: setMilliseconds
method.shortdesc: Sets the milliseconds of a specified Date object according to local time.
method.description: Returns the number of milliseconds between the new date and midnight, January 1, 1970.

parameters.name: ms
parameters.shortdesc: An integer value from 0 to 999.

method.name: setMinutes
method.shortdesc: Sets the minutes of a specified Date object according to local time.
method.description: Returns the number of milliseconds between the new date and midnight, January 1, 1970.

parameters.name: minutes
parameters.shortdesc: An integer value from 0 to 59.

method.name: setSeconds
method.shortdesc: Sets the seconds of a specified Date object according to local time.
method.description: Returns the number of milliseconds between the new date and midnight, January 1, 1970.

parameters.name: seconds
parameters.shortdesc: An integer value from 0 to 59.

method.name: setMonth
method.shortdesc: Sets the month of a specified Date object according to local time.
method.description: Returns the number of milliseconds between the new date and midnight, January 1, 1970.

parameters.name: month
parameters.shortdesc: An integer value from 0 (Jan) to 11 (Dec).

method.name: setUTCDate
method.shortdesc: Sets the date of a specified Date object according to universal time.
method.description: Returns the number of milliseconds between the new date and midnight, January 1, 1970 in UTC time.

parameters.name: date
parameters.shortdesc: An integer from 1 to 31 indicating the day of the month.

method.name: setUTCFullYear
method.shortdesc: Sets the year of a specified Date object according to UTC, can also set the month and date.
method.description: Returns the number of milliseconds between the date set and midnight, January 1, 1970, in UTC.

parameters.name: year
parameters.shortdesc: The year expressed in four digits.

method.name: setUTCHours
method.shortdesc: Sets the hours of a specified Date object according to UTC.
method.description: Returns the number of milliseconds between the date set and midnight, January 1, 1970, in UTC.

parameters.name: hours
parameters.shortdesc: An integer value from 0 (midnight) to 23 (11 PM) indicating the hour to be set.

method.name: setUTCMilliseconds
method.shortdesc: Sets the milliseconds of a specified Date object according to UTC.
method.description: Returns the number of milliseconds between the date set and midnight, January 1, 1970, in UTC.

parameters.name: ms
parameters.shortdesc: An integer value in the range of 0 to 999 indicating the number of milliseconds to set.

method.name: setUTCMinutes
method.shortdesc: Sets the minutes of a specified Date object according to UTC.
method.description: Returns the number of milliseconds between the date set and midnight, January 1, 1970, in UTC.

parameters.name: min
parameters.shortdesc: An integer value in the range 0 to 59 indicating the number of minutes to be set.

method.name: setUTCSeconds
method.shortdesc: Sets the seconds of a specified Date object according to UTC.
method.description: Returns the number of milliseconds between the date set and midnight, January 1, 1970, in UTC.

parameters.name: sec
parameters.shortdesc: An integer value in the range 0 to 59 indicating the number of seconds to set.

method.name: setUTCMonth
method.shortdesc: Sets the month of a specified Date object according to UTC.
method.description: Returns the number of milliseconds between the date set and midnight, January 1, 1970, in UTC.

parameters.name: month
parameters.shortdesc: An integer value in the range 0 (Jan.) to 11 (Dec.) indicating the month to set.

method.name: setTime
method.shortdesc: Sets the date of a specified Date object in milliseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970.
method.description: Returns the value of ms.

parameters.name: ms
parameters.shortdesc: An integer indicating the number of milliseconds between the date set and midnight, January 1, 1970.

method.name: setYear
method.shortdesc: Sets the year of a specified Date object according to local time, as a difference between the current year and 1900.
method.description: Returns the number of milliseconds between the date set and midnight, January 1, 1970.

parameters.name: year
parameters.shortdesc: An integer value indicating the year to set.
parameters.description: The method interprets a 1- or 2- digit value to mean the 1900s; for example, 13 is interpreted to mean 1913.

method.name: toDateString
method.description: Returns the date as a string.

method.name: toTimeString
method.description: Returns the time as a string.

method.name: toLocaleString
method.description: Returns a string value representing the date and time stored in the Date object in human readable format (localized).

method.name: toLocaleDateString
method.description: Returns the date as a localized string.

method.name: toLocaleTimeString
method.description: Returns the time as a localized string.

method.name: toGMTString
method.description: Returns the date and time adjusted to GMT (UTC) as a string.

method.name: toUTCString
method.description: Returns the date and time adjusted to UTC as a string.

method.name: toString
method.shortdesc: Returns a string value representing the date and time stored in the Date object in human readable format.
method.description: Returns the following string is an example of the format returned by this method: Mon Aug 13, 10:54:21 GMT-0700 2001.

method.name: valueOf
method.shortdesc: The valueOf() method returns the number of milliseconds that have passed since midnight, Returns an integer.
